page.title: 08ATTITUDES IN TILSTON
page.content: As this is a{rural area}life seems to go on at a slower pace than in the surrounding towns. The main concerns appear to be connected with{ecology} e.g.{fox hunting, badger baiting} (illegal),{tree and hedge conservation etc. Other concerns in the village are {litter, street lighting, speed limits, {bus shelter and C.N.D. There is mixed feeling about{fox {hunting,}the farmers tending to approve as they lose a lot of poultry to the foxes. Another area of concern is the {disposal of garden rubbish}and large unwanted items. Most villagers would like to see a skip provided but there is some disagreement as to where it might be sited. Most people do not wish for extra {street lighting}as they wish to retain the rural atmosphere of the village.
